name: Blood Ritual
entries: At 7th level, you learn a Blood Ritual. As a Bonus Action, you can roll your Sanguine Die and take that amount of damage to produce one of the following effects:

items: Gain a Climb or a Swim speed equal to your Walking speed.
Gain proficiency in a Skill/Tool you arenâ€™t proficient in.
Double your Jump height and length.

entries: This lasts for a number of rounds equal to the value rolled on the Sanguine Die x2.
